feature.label: iSphere Job Log Explorer for WDSCi 7.0+ (optional)
feature.description: iSphere Job Log Explorer for WDSCi 7.0 The "iSphere Job Log Explorer Feature (WDSCi)" provides an editor for exploring job logs. It can be started from the context menu of an IBM i spooled file (name must be QPJOBLOG) or a local stream file.
